LanguageData.AM_AmazonMod_STR4: I am beginning to question if the Amazon warriors are right.
LanguageData.AM_AmazonMod_STR6: There are males in our colony and as Amazons we should banish all of the males.
LanguageData.AMAZON_BOW_DESC: A variation on the common greatbow. Fires a heavy arrow long distances. The Amazon variant of this greatbow is capable of inflicting a powerful neurotoxin.
LanguageData.AM_AmazonMod_OP1: Do Amazon weapons alter the targets age?
LanguageData.AM_AmazonMod_OP2: Do Amazon weapons inflict a neuro toxin?
LanguageData.AM_AmazonMod_OP3: Do Amazon weapons cause mood debuffs?
LanguageData.AM_AmazonMod_OP4: Do Amazon weapons increase doubt in the targets idealogy?
